name: freeCodeCamp
description: freeCodeCamp offers a comprehensive, free curriculum for learning web development and coding through hands‑on projects.

name: Codecademy
description: Codecademy provides interactive coding lessons to help you learn programming languages and build projects.

name: Coursera
description: Coursera offers online courses from top universities and companies covering a broad range of subjects.

name: Udemy
description: Udemy features a vast library of video courses on technology, business, and creative skills at affordable prices.

name: edX
description: edX provides high‑quality online courses and professional certifications from prestigious institutions worldwide.

name: Pluralsight
description: Pluralsight offers technology‑focused courses and skill assessments to help professionals advance their tech careers.

name: Khan Academy
description: Khan Academy provides free educational resources and interactive lessons across a wide range of subjects.

name: MIT OpenCourseWare
description: MIT OpenCourseWare offers free access to course materials from a wide range of MIT’s academic programs.

name: The Odin Project
description: The Odin Project provides a free, comprehensive curriculum for learning full‑stack web development.

name: W3Schools
description: W3Schools offers easy‑to‑follow tutorials and references on web development technologies.

name: MDN Web Docs
description: MDN Web Docs is an authoritative resource for learning web technologies and standards.

name: Udacity
description: Udacity offers industry‑focused nanodegree programs and courses to build in‑demand tech skills.

name: Code.org
description: Code.org is dedicated to expanding access to computer science education through free coding lessons and resources.

name: Treehouse
description: Treehouse offers video‑based tutorials and courses designed to help beginners learn web and mobile development.

name: LeetCode
description: LeetCode provides coding challenges and interview preparation to help improve your algorithm and problem‑solving skills.

name: HackerRank
description: HackerRank offers coding challenges and competitions to help you practice and demonstrate your programming abilities.

name: Exercism
description: Exercism provides hands‑on coding exercises and mentorship to help you improve your programming skills.

name: Codewars
description: Codewars challenges you with coding puzzles to sharpen your skills through practice and community solutions.

name: GeeksforGeeks
description: GeeksforGeeks offers tutorials, articles, and coding examples to help you learn programming and prepare for interviews.

name: TutorialsPoint
description: TutorialsPoint provides comprehensive tutorials and learning resources on a wide range of programming topics.

name: SoloLearn
description: SoloLearn offers bite‑sized coding lessons and interactive challenges through a mobile‑friendly platform.

name: Scrimba
description: Scrimba provides interactive screencasts that let you code along and learn front‑end development in real‑time.

name: LinkedIn Learning
description: LinkedIn Learning offers a vast library of video courses on business, tech, and creative skills.

name: GitHub Learning Lab
description: GitHub Learning Lab provides interactive projects and tutorials to help you master GitHub and open‑source development.

name: Google Developers Training
description: Google Developers Training offers courses and tutorials to help you build modern web and mobile applications.

name: Microsoft Learn
description: Microsoft Learn provides free, interactive learning paths and modules to help you master Microsoft technologies.

name: IBM Developer
description: IBM Developer offers tutorials, tools, and resources to help you innovate with IBM’s cutting‑edge technologies.

name: edabit
description: edabit provides bite‑sized coding challenges to help you practice programming in a fun and engaging way.

name: CodeSignal
description: CodeSignal offers coding assessments and challenges to help you prepare for technical interviews.

name: Frontend Mentor
description: Frontend Mentor provides real‑world web design challenges to help you improve your front‑end development skills.

name: Real Python
description: Real Python offers in‑depth tutorials and articles to help you master Python programming.

name: Dev.to
description: Dev.to is a community‑driven platform where developers share insights, tutorials, and experiences about coding.

name: CodeProject
description: CodeProject features articles, tutorials, and code samples to help developers solve real‑world programming challenges.

name: Ray Wenderlich
description: Ray Wenderlich offers high‑quality tutorials and courses focused on mobile app development and game programming.

name: CodeNewbie
description: CodeNewbie is a welcoming community that supports beginner programmers with resources, stories, and advice.

name: Hackr.io
description: Hackr.io curates user‑reviewed recommendations for online coding courses to help you choose the best learning path.

name: Educative.io
description: Educative.io offers interactive, text‑based coding courses designed to help you learn at your own pace.

name: Class Central
description: Class Central aggregates free and paid online courses from top institutions to help you find the best learning opportunities.

name: CodeChef
description: CodeChef hosts competitive programming contests and challenges to help you sharpen your algorithm skills.

name: HackerEarth
description: HackerEarth provides coding challenges, hackathons, and competitions for developers to test their skills.

name: Programiz
description: Programiz offers beginner‑friendly tutorials and interactive examples to help you learn programming fundamentals.
